name: Dedicated Adversary
description: Your repeated encounters with a particular type of enemy have honed your skills against that foe.
prerequisites: No levels in a class that has the favored enemy class feature.
benefit: When you select this feat, choose a specific kind of creature, such as wolf, frost giant, goblin, or babau demon. You gain the rangerâ€™s favored enemy class ability against this particular type of creature with a bonus of +2. This feat does not grant the favored enemy class feature for the purposes of prerequisites. If you later gain the favored enemy class feature, you can replace this feat with a feat for which you qualify and whose prerequisites include the favored enemy class feature.
special: You can gain this feat multiple times. Its effects do not stack. Each time you take the feat, it applies to a different creature.
